name: light commercial vehicle production | light commercial vehicle | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8559/documentation

The values refer to the production of one average van. Environmental interventions in the vehicle production are derived from the production of the Golf A4. Disposal is included too.



The inventory includes  processes of  material, energy and water use in vehicle manufacturing. Rail and road transport of materials is accounted for. Plant infrastructure is included, addressing issues such as land use, building, road and parking construction. The disposal of the vehicle is as well accounted for.
category: C:Manufacturing/29:Manufacture of motor vehicles, trailers and semi-trailers/291:Manufacture of motor vehicles/2910:Manufacture of motor vehicles

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The material consumption reflect a modern vehicle. For vehicle manufacturing data for the manufacturing of a passenger car has been employed as an first estimate.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Vehicle production data are taken from an LCI analysis of the Golf A4. Data for the vehicle disposal reflect the Swiss situation.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Current production technology, environmental issues have been addressed in the past.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Production data for one German passenger car type is used as an first estimate for Europe
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data for material consumption is based on expert estimates. Manufacturing data is based on an LCI study of one passenger car.
